data.text:
Welcome aboard our 8 flights crewed entirely by women. From the land to the skies, we continue flying towards a more equitable future. 

#InternationalWomensDay https://t.co/xGwmXtFXGk

We believe International Women’s Day is every day, but today we honor it with 8 flights crewed exclusively by women. Together we must reach a future free from gender inequalities. #BreakTheBias https://t.co/ivnVp1DAtm

Our biggest flight sale of the year is here! So now's the best time to go to Mexico City like you've always wanted.

data.text: We want to make your travel experience smoother 😉, that’s why we implemented the Digital Spine technology, developed by SkyTeam. Thanks to this new addition, if your itinerary includes both Aeromexico and Delta flights, you can check-in through either app or web site easily. ✈️ https://t.co/1Z7VzrWQR5

This lovely town is perhaps the most beautiful example of the colonial era of Mexico. Word of caution, you may never want to leave. Don’t let our Special Flight Sale deals pass you by. 
https://t.co/F1EnT2lEto https://t.co/hwmlSmyTb7

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text:
The Omicron variant of COVID-19 is affecting less of our flights every day. We ask that you please check if yours has been modified. 
https://t.co/xYJe4GCeJI https://t.co/sIGEyWMCjt

We have HEPA filters installed on every aircraft on every flight. They eliminate 99.99% of germs and viruses so you can fly with absolute confidence. Learn more about our safety measures here: https://t.co/EghPtVMIh9 https://t.co/viZutIeQAc

Plan your trip to Guadalajara today and take advantage of these great deals. Then, you can just fly when you’re ready.  
https://t.co/y28JBO2ycb https://t.co/eO4MWG5UIw
Book now, fly when you're ready. Your dream destination will be there for when you decide to go. 🛫 https://t.co/skvKBoo7KT
